articles.author: Jeanette Settembre
articles.title: Ketchup shortage hits restaurants, fast food chains across the U.S. - Fox News
articles.description: America’s favorite condiment is the latest shortage to hit restaurants and fast food chains as a result of high delivery demand and increased take out during the pandemic, a new report suggests.
articles.content:
Restaurants cant catch up with the demand for ketchup.
Prices for ketchup packets have gone up 13% since January 2020, according to data from Plate IQ, a restaurant industry technology platform, as … [+2072 chars]

articles.title: Arkansas' GOP governor vetoes bill restricting transgender health care - CBS News
articles.description: He said the bill was "a product of the cultural war in America"
articles.content: Arkansas' Republican Governor Asa Hutchinson vetoed a bill on Monday that would have restricted health care procedures for transgender minors. Transgender rights have become a new flashpoint for Repu… [+2734 chars]

articles.title: New Yorkers rally outside court where man faces hate crime charge vs Filipina - Rappler
articles.description: Hate crimes reported against Asian Americans increased 149% annually in 2020 in 16 major US cities, according to the Center for the Study of Hate and Extremism at California State University, San Bernardino
articles.content: "This attack would not have happened if he was not released," said Phil Wong, president of the Chinese American Citizens Alliance of Greater New York, standing in front of the courthouse, where demon… [+80 chars]

articles.author: William Cooper
articles.title: Commentary: Unusual, enormous bigotry has been long directed at Asian-Americans - CNA
articles.description: Problematic attitudes towards Asian-Americans and the rise of more explicit forms of racism suggest a rethinking in America’s race relations is long overdue, says commentator William Cooper.
articles.content: TRUCKEE, California: Asian-American hate in America is getting worse. A month after the murder of six women of Asian descent in Georgia, a 65-year-old Filipino woman was assaulted for no apparent rea… [+5337 chars]
